trans-unit.source: Contains properties that specify how an application should behave relative to WPF features that are in the PresentationFramework assembly.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定相對於 PresentationFramework 組件中的 WPF 功能的應用程式應如何運作的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the application should use the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.InactiveSelectionHighlightBrush*> and <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.InactiveSelectionHighlightTextBrush*> properties for the colors of inactive selected items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式是否應該使用<> *> 和<> *> 內容的非作用中的選取項目的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property depends which version of WPF that your app targets.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值取決於 WPF 的版本，您的應用程式的目標。

trans-unit.source: If your app targets WPF 4.0 or earlier, the default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式為目標的 WPF 4.0 或更早版本，預設值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: If your app targets WPF 4.5, the default is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式的目標 WPF 4.5，預設值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you use this property to change the behavior of WPF, you must change the property’s value early in the app’s lifetime, such in the constructor of the class that inherits from Application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個屬性來變更 WPF 的行為，您必須在應用程式的存留期內，例如應用程式會繼承的類別建構函式中的早期變更屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: After the value is read, you cannot change it again.
trans-unit.target: 在讀取值之後，您無法再次變更。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the application should use the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.InactiveSelectionHighlightBrush*> and <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors.InactiveSelectionHighlightTextBrush*> properties for the colors of inactive selected items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應用程式應該使用<> *> 和<> *> 屬性之色彩的非作用中的選取項目; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a data-bound <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> should display a string that is identical to the value of the source its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text*> property
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在資料繫結<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>應該顯示其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text*>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text*>與相同的來源值的字串

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property depends which version of WPF that your app targets.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值取決於 WPF 的版本，您的應用程式的目標。

trans-unit.source: If your app targets WPF 4.0 or earlier, the default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式為目標的 WPF 4.0 或更早版本，預設值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: If your app targets WPF 4.5, the default is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式的目標 WPF 4.5，預設值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you use this property to change the behavior of WPF, you must change the property’s value early in the app’s lifetime, such in the constructor of the class that inherits from Application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個屬性來變更 WPF 的行為，您必須在應用程式的存留期內，例如應用程式會繼承的類別建構函式中的早期變更屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: After the value is read, you cannot change it again.
trans-unit.target: 在讀取值之後，您無法再次變更。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a data-bound <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> should display a string that is identical to the value of the source its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text*> property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料繫結<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>應該會顯示相同的來源值的字串及其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text*>屬性，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a failed copy or cut operation in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase"></xref> instance results in a <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出失敗的複製或剪下的作業中是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase"></xref>執行個體中的結果<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If a clipboard operation fails, such as with a **HRESULT 0x800401D0 (CLIPBRD_E_CANT_OPEN)** error, a corresponding <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException> (which is a type of ExternalException) is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿作業失敗，例如與**HRESULT 0x800401D0 (CLIPBRD_E_CANT_OPEN)**相對應的錯誤， <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>（這一種 ExternalException) 就會擲回。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>

trans-unit.source: Because the Win32 `OpenClipboard` API acts globally, well-written applications should call the corresponding `CloseClipboard` API as soon as they have completed their clipboard operations.
trans-unit.target: 因為 Win32 `OpenClipboard` API 做全域，編寫完善的應用程式應該呼叫對應`CloseClipboard`API，因為使用者必須完成它們的剪貼簿作業。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, other applications running in the same session will be unable to access clipboard functions.
trans-unit.target: 否則，相同的工作階段中執行其他應用程式將無法存取剪貼簿函式。

trans-unit.source: In WPF, such a denial of access to the clipboard is normally ignored silently.
trans-unit.target: 在 WPF 中，為通常以無訊息模式忽略這類拒絕存取剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: However, applications can opt to receive an `ExternalException` upon failure by setting the ShouldThrowOnCopyOrCutFailure flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，應用程式可以選擇要收到`ExternalException`ShouldThrowOnCopyOrCutFailure 旗標設定為 失敗時`true`。

trans-unit.source: However, opting to receive exceptions also requires the application to handle <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Cut%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Copy%2A> RoutedUICommands through a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, and then apply that binding to all TextBoxBase controls (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>) in the application.
trans-unit.target: 不過，也會收到例外狀況選擇需要應用程式處理<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Cut%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Copy%2A>透過 RoutedUICommands <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>，然後將該繫結套用至所有在 TextBoxBase 控制項 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>) 應用程式中。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Copy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Cut%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application should ensure that it handles ExternalExceptions resulting from copy and cut operations in the CommandBinding's Executed handler.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應確定它會處理 ExternalExceptions 造成 CommandBinding Executed 處理常式中的複製和剪下作業。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a failed copy or cut operation in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase"></xref> instance results in a <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果失敗的複製或剪下的作業中<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase"></xref>執行個體中的結果<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
